sentences.text: nʲe midʲida nɛ, modʲ ɛɛkujib tɔr mambiØ, mu
noz ɔrnoju, noz kexon, no kexon kɔltaɡoʃ bɔɔ, manʔ nʲiuʔ, mu
ɔbuxoɔ kasa paɡe nʲeb, ɛtɔ, sɛrʔ
modʲ manʔ nʲiuʔ, ɛɛkujinʲʔ ne manʔ nʲezuʔ

meta.author: author
meta.title: Pregnancy superstitions - Endangered Languages and Cultures of Siberia
